5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: ta' b. Yasar reported that he had asked Zaid b. Thabit about recital along with the Imam, to which he said:There should be no recital along with the Imam in anything, and alleged that he recited:" By the star when it sets" (Surah Najm) before the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and he did not prostrate himself
